page.title: 03ADMASTON SHOPS
page.content: In Admaston there is a row of shops. They include a Village grocer, Hair dresser,A wool shop, Off Licence and newsagent. The Village grocer is a small grocery which is owned by Mr&Mrs Welch.The Hair dresser is owned by Mr Paul Newman and is a unisex salon.The Wool shop is owned by Mrs Mary Lou. The Newsagent is owned by Mrs J.Nevett.The off licence is also a grocers which sell frozen food and vegetables. There is a post box and a telephone box next to the grocers,and also a small car park. There is a Methodist chapel and a local public house called the Pheasant.There are also many playing fields.There is a community house which has play schemes and also a small plagroup.
